mainSequence.step: Visitor asks for the tricks list page.
UserInterface activates and receives the request.
UserInterface instructs Domain to execute the use-case.
Domain activates and initiates the use-case.
Domain communicates with Infrastructure to fetch the list of tricks from the database.
Infrastructure retrieves the tricks list and sends it back to Domain.
UserInterface presents the fetched tricks list to the Visitor.
Domain deactivates after completing the task.
UserInterface renders the page containing the tricks list for the Visitor.
